mapper.insert: insert into user (nickname, age, gender, before_ps_id, after_ps_id, social_id, provider, level, register_date, update_date) values (#{nickname}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{beforePsId}, #{afterPsId}, #{socialId}, #{provider}, #{level}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select * from user where nickname like concat('%',#{word}, '%')
